channel.title: Avanti, New 317, VPS hosted for 12 months, webclient!
channel.description:
Hello, here is my new up-coming server Avanti. Coded to perfection, and a great community. We hope to see you online! 24/7 VPS hosted. .co.uk domain coming soon. This server is brand spanking new! Updates regularly.
[b]Forums[/b]: http://avanti.forumotion.co.uk/
[b]Webclient[/b]: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/87131659/webclient.html (if having trouble visit forums for desktop link)
[center][b]FEATURES[/b][/center] [center]ALL skills including dung 100% working![/center] [center]Lots of NEW bosses and monsters to kill[/center] [center]100% squeal of fortune and point shop[/center] [center]Pictures can not justify the epicness of this server![/center] [center]Register on forums for updates and news[/center] [center]custom pk teleports as well as old school[/center] [center]Custom GFX exclusive to Avanti[/center] [center][b][size=14pt]So if you fancy getting involved with and up-coming 24/7 growing RSPS, then join Avanti we promise we wont disappoint! [/size][/b][/center]
[img]http://s1.postimg.org/4uq5yctzz/Untitled.png[/img]

item.title: Avanti, New 317, VPS hosted for 12 months, webclient!
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

I never got this, what’s the point of having sexy interfaces but keeping the graphics shit? Seriously, if you’re going to do a 317 make it like an actual 317. Without all the higher revision stuff. What is the logic and reason behind this?

Read full topic
item.source: Avanti, New 317, VPS hosted for 12 months, webclient!
